section.title: Usage of meta_namespace - example 1
section.para: This example shows how to use the namespace reflection macros and the usage of the meta_namespace template. In particular it shows the usage of the base_name and full_name namespace name getters and the use of the scope and ancestors typedefs.
In this example only the namespaces that are pre-registered by Mirror are reflected. See if you would like to find out more about namespace registering.
